title: Why I wanna switch to overwatch so bad
body: I got blue screened of death in my last game causing me to shudown and it took me ages to get back in my game. When I reconected I tried my best to help my team win. I RECONNECTED AND STILL GOT PLACED ON LEAVERBUSTER???? why?!?!!??!?

replies.body: This is an illogical reason to switch to Overwatch, the penalty is almost EXACTLY the same.
Lmao League players who can't get outta bronze will find any excuse to blame this game and get mad. I've already accepted that I'm stuck playing League for all eternity.
